channel.title: Guides | KubeDB on Run production-grade databases easily on Kubernetes
channel.description: Recent content in Guides | KubeDB on Run production-grade databases easily on Kubernetes

item.title: Guides | KubeDB
item.description: Guides Guides show you how to perform tasks with KubeDB. Elasticsearch. Shows how to manage Elasticsearch using KubeDB. Memcached. Shows how to manage Memcached using KubeDB. MongoDB. Shows how to manage MongoDB using KubeDB. MySQL. Shows how to manage MySQL using KubeDB. Percona XtraDB. Shows how to manage Percona XtraDB using KubeDB. PgBouncer. Shows how to manage PgBouncer using KubeDB. PostgreSQL. Shows how to manage PostgreSQL using KubeDB. ProxySQL. Shows how to manage ProxySQL using KubeDB.
